body:
Comment 1 by **milak.mlk**: 
To fix the problem, i updated one a the templates with adding those lines :
<div>
Packages : 
{{range .PkgRoots}}
<a href="/pkg/{{html .}}">{{html .}}</a> <span
class="sep">|</span>
{{end}}
</div>
in go\lib\godoc\godoc.html
Bye
